text: Nia daangada Israel, dugua godou haihai hagamiami budubudu mee gadoo be digau bouli. Goodou guu huli gi daha mo di godou God, gu hagalee manawa dahi gi Mee. Nia madagoaa huogodoo i hongo tenua, goodou guu hui goodou gi di god Baal be nia ahina huihui nadau huaidina, ge gu aloho nia huwa laagau ala e hagabau gee ai goodou bolo ne hui goodou go mee.
